    • About Steve Schwab


    Portland Lifestyle Team offers unparalleled service to ALL clients in the Portland Oregon real estate market. Your complete satisfaction with our service and representation is our number one priority. Portland Lifestyle Team serves the entire Portland Oregon real estate market including the surrounding communities such as the Beaverton, Tigard, Hillsboro, Lake Oswego, SW Portland and NW Portland areas.

    Whether you are considering buying a home, selling a home or both, we know this area inside and out.
